programme.title: On The Red Dot - What Failure Taught Me - EP 19
programme.desc: (Encore) When Syed Azmir's rocketing careers as a talented footballer and singing sensation come crashing down, a past that he once abandoned gives him a second chance to change his life. See the flip side of Singapore's obsession with winning! This brand new series celebrates the losers among us who rise from defeat to create a positive impact in the lives around them.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games - EP 5
programme.desc: Ellen's Game of Games is an hour of supersized versions of the most popular and hilariously fun games from The Ellen DeGeneres Show. Hosted and executive produced by DeGeneres, this game show is like no other contestants, pulled right from the audience, will have to maneuver massive obstacles, answer questions under immense pressure and face a gigantic plunge into the unknown.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S8 - EP 6

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 13

programme.title: 真实档案 True Files 4 - EP 11
programme.desc: "True Files" is a thirty minute docu - drama series. Every episode looks at a different high profile case from true legal files of the past. The cases selected are those well - covered by the media during the time of occurrence and court cases which today's viewers will still find captivating. They are controversial, emotionally charged and dramatically rich. The cases in this new series are a sad reflection of a man's moment of folly, greed or unexplainable insanity.

programme.title: Everyday Gourmet With Justine Schofield S6 - EP 25
programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. Everyday Gourmet presents can-do cooking ideas as well as tips, tricks and insights into making us all more confident in the kitchen. Justine believes when it comes to cooking, a little bit of confidence goes a long way, and she'll spend most of the time building up your confidence in the kitchen.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S7 - EP 12
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

Many years after Baryon's defeat, a carefree boy named Rex comes across the Tuner and becomes the new Dino Master. Meanwhile, Darkno takes over one planet after another and finally reaches Earth.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 2

CP Corporation, being one of the Fortune 500 companies in the world, is the main cooperating partner in this anchor project. With its high technology in pig rearing methods, it has brought about changes to traditional agricultural methods, unravelling a new chapter in agricultural and farming developments in Jilin. (重)中新吉林食品区重点项目的生猪养殖场是拥有新加坡农粮局认可的无口蹄疫区；换言之它能在未来为新加坡国人直接提供安全的新鲜猪肉。生猪养殖场的经营伙伴是位列世界五百强公司的正大集团。正大集团的高科技养殖方式和先进的现代化猪场有别于以往传统的养猪作业，这为中国和新加坡在养殖业的发展掀开了新篇章，也改变了当地的农业面貌。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 3
programme.desc: Singapore, a little red dot, devoid of natural resources and sparse land, faces the difficulty of sustaining survival. However, we have come so far on this journey of nation-building. programme.title: 健康在于你 11 Here's To Health 11 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) In this episode, Peifen and celebrity guest BuKoh Mary will speak with Dr Alex Soh from NUH about the causes of Irritable Bowel Syndrome. Prof Lee will also explain how probiotics can help prevent IBS. We will also learn about Barre Yoga and how to prepare a dish that helps improve intestinal health. programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The Orang Asli - recognised as the first people of Peninsula Malaysia. It's a diverse collection of tribes and most, with government assistance, now live in riverine villages in Taman Negara. But there are some who still follow the old hunter-gatherer ways. But such a way of life - idyllic as it may seem, does not mean they have it easy. Host Paul Foster journeys up the Tembeling River and into the primeval forest in search of just such a community from the Batek tribe. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 7

programme.desc: (R) Xiu Hao hires a physical trainer for Haila. She is surprised that the trainer is her ex-boyfriend, Cui Zhixun. Sharon senses that Haila and Zhixun know each other. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀浩替海拉聘请一位教练。海拉发现教练竟是前男友崔志勋，大感惊讶。雪伦发觉崔志勋与海拉相识。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 8
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 21
programme.desc: The three grannies look for Zuodou at Shengzhu's house but get chased away by Shengzhu's mother. She tells them Shengzhu and Zuodou have separated. Zuodou discovers that Eric has been keeping Shengzhu's photo secretly. Eric admits that he has been carrying a torch for Shengzhu. Shengzhu needs quick cash and thus sells her car to her colleague cheaply. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)三位奶奶来胜珠家想找作斗，却被胜珠的母亲赶走，并告诉她们胜珠和作斗已经分手了。艾瑞克偷藏胜珠照片的事情被作斗发现，只好承认自己暗恋过韩胜珠。胜珠为了减轻经济负担，只好将车便宜卖给同事。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 22
programme.desc: Longmin does not approve his sister dating the spendthrift Shengtai, but he has to give his blessings to them as Tingwei is pregnant. Shengzhu's mother dislikes the immature Tingwei and does not feel like accepting her as daughter-in-law. Zuodou only wants Shengzhu to film his documentary. Jingshu persuades Shengzhu to film the documentary for Wu He, but she refuses. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)龙民反对妹妹和败家子胜泰交往，但庭薇已经怀孕，所以龙民只好答应让他们在一起。胜珠的母亲也对庭薇这个不懂事的女生很反感，不想要接受这样的媳妇。作斗只愿意让胜珠拍自己的记录片。景淑劝胜珠帮吴赫拍记录片，但被她拒绝。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Donghao who initially refused to represent Zhenyu's father, Zaihe, suddenly appears at the court during the second hearing. Donghao even has the contract ready for Zaihe to sign so that he can represent Zaihe. Zhenyu is overjoyed and hopeful because if Donghao steps in, his father can be saved. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)原本拒绝当振宇父亲载赫辩护律师的东浩突然出现第二次审判法庭上，还准备了聘用合同，只要载赫在上面签字，他就可以在法庭上开始辩护了，让振宇十分高兴并觉得有希望，因东浩一出马，父亲就有救了。.

programme.title: 料理的秘密 Food Secrets - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Hong Kong roast goose restaurants are well known worldwide. Besides the fine-grained goose meat, the good marinade and seasonings, roasting technique and dipping sauce are all essential to make a crispy-skin, tender and high graded roast goose. What are the hard work and cooking secrets behind? (重)香港烧鹅远近驰名，新加坡游客尤其喜爱。除了采用肉质细致的黑鬃名种鹅，烧鹅的腌料、调味、烧制和沾酱，也样样严谨而考究；满足顶级烧鹅"皮脆、肉嫩、汁好"的三大要诀，这些家传老字号到底私藏了什么料理的秘密.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Marriage is sacred! However, it seems those filing for divorce now are due to absurd reasons! The 7-year itch is pass! Veteran hosts Bryan Wong and Quan Yifong take over the helm and let's see how they, together with the guests, view this topic on divorce! (重)结婚是神圣的！但现代人很轻易把"离婚"两个字挂在嘴边，而理由更是离谱！主持老将王禄江和权怡凤从陈邦鋆及庞蕾馨手中接过主持棒子，他们和众嘉宾如何看待离婚这件事；记得收看本集节目！.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 53
programme.desc: (R) Minzhi, Xiantai and Yijun find out that Xianying has bought a commercial building in Seoul. The trio suspects that Xianying has lied about her investment in Vietnam as she should not be financially sound after the failed venture in Vietnam. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)民植、贤泰和益俊发现仙英买下一栋商业大楼。三人质疑仙英为何在越南的美容事业失利后还有足够的资金买楼，于是怀疑仙英在越南的投资案动了手脚。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu discovers that Xianxiu's alibi is fabricated after seeing the information left by a couple on a pub's photo wall. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)自从智旭见到一对情侣提供在酒吧壁上照片的情报，发现贤秀所谓的不在场证据是假的后，开始怀疑自己在帮坏人脱罪。他请方股长瞒着奉熙暗地里调查一下贤秀。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 63

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 64

programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Singapore and Hong Kong are both close in proximity and culture, so Singaporean students can integrate easily into the local environment. (重)新加坡与香港的地理位置接近，没有多大的文化差异，使得新加坡籍留学生能够更快地融入当地环境。新加坡与美国建交超过半个世纪之久。多年来，美国的顶尖教育质量吸引了不少新加坡学子前去追求美国梦，完成求学梦。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 54
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai returns to Seoul from Vietnam with evidence that Xianying has cheated KP Group of a huge sum of money previously. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰回到韩国，在仙英和载永面前出示两份不同的合约书，指仙英诈骗了英鎬一百亿。贤泰要载永让英鎬复职，否则将证据交给警方。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Youjing calls Zhixu and asks him to come over to her office, claiming that some clues and the missing painting in chef Yang's house have been found. Zhixu rushes over immediately. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宥静打电话给智旭邀请他到她的办公室一趟，表示已找到在杨主厨家中遗失的画和线索，智旭立刻赶去检察局。同时，奉熙收到高灿浩约见面的电话，说要告诉她那个送给她皮鞋的神秘人是谁。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 65
programme.desc: Mingxi suddenly allows Daojing to marry Zhi-an, but states that they can only hold a wedding ceremony after Zhi-an returns from overseas studies three years later. Daojing exposes Mingxi's ploy - she is not sincere in accepting Zhi-an. She only wants Daojing to submit to Yanghao. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙突然答应让道京跟知安结婚，但条件是两人必须先分开三年，等知安留学回国后才办婚礼。道京揭穿明熙其实是想要他尽快向阳浩低头，不是真的接受知安。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 66
programme.desc: Yanghao is shocked to find out that not only does Daojing not want to return to Haesung Corporation, he has actually starts a business by himself. The agitated Yanghao suffers a heart attack. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)阳浩在前往夏威夷的途中发现道京不但拒绝回海成，甚至还自己创业了。阳浩过于激动，心肌梗塞晕倒。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 6
programme.desc: One of China's greatest classical novels, "Dream of the Red Chamber" details the life and food of noble families. Host Danny Yeo visits Shanghai and Yangzhou to find a sumptuous feast inspired by this literature. 《红楼梦》可说是中国古代社会的一本百科全书，详细地描绘了当时贵族家庭的日常生活，也有许多关于美食的描述。这一集，主持人杨君伟将遵循古代名著的撰写，走访扬州与上海，寻找依据文字拼贴而出的一桌珍馐美味。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 7
programme.desc: Shanmei pities the zombie as she cannot find her body and also cannot remember how she died. Shanmei requests for everyone to help the zombie for as long as possible. General Winter and the rest help the zombie not to decompose further. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)善美可怜活死人找不到尸体又不知道自己是怎么死的，于是想尽力在她变成厉鬼之前帮助她。活死人得到大家的帮助，暂时不再腐烂下去。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 4
programme.desc: Meiwei wanted to join the trio and learn from Fugui but was fiercely rejected by Fugui. Jian Wang once said that no one else in the Zeng family could become a chef after Fugui. Meiwei refused to buckle under pressure and wants to use her own method to jolt Jian Wangs memory. 三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Osaka is the second largest city in Japan but behind the bustling neon lights and vibrancy of the city, there is the existence of a little known slum. These abandoned slum dewellers receive free meals in the park, sleep rough and wander in the streets. Lets follow Yifeng and fixer to find out more. 大阪是日本第二大城市,繁华璀璨，霓虹闪亮的背后，有谁会知道大阪有个鲜为人知的贫民窟，公园领膳食，风餐露宿，流浪街头无人关问，落难当头被人弃。让权怡凤带大家跟随着线人的脚步前往一探究竟。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 55
programme.desc: Ep 55: Xianying wants to wreck the good relationship between Zhenshu and Xiuqing. She tells Xiuqing that Zhenshu is her biological mother on Xiuqing's birthday. Zaiyong rubs salt into Xiuqing's wound by telling her that Xiantai has known the truth some time ago, but chose to keep the matter from Xiuqing. Ep 55: 仙英嫉妒真淑和秀卿感情好，于是在秀卿生日当天告诉秀卿她的生母就是真淑。载永落井下石，说贤泰其实早就知道，但故意向她隐瞒。秀卿一时之间接受不了事实，没有出席家人们为她准备的生日庆祝会。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 12
programme.desc: Fengxi takes the initiative to represent Director Bian in his case. However, Director Bian still gets a heavy fine eventually due to insufficient proof. Zhixu and Enhe shake their heads helplessly when they see Director Bian chasing Fengxi relentlessly outside the court. The chief prosecutor asks Youjing and Zhihan to re-investigate his son, Xijun's murder. 奉熙主动替卞代表打官司，却因为证据不足，结果卞代表还是被处以高额的罚款。看着在法庭外紧追着奉熙不舍的卞代表，智旭和恩赫都无奈地摇着头。地检长嘱咐宥静和知涵重新调查他儿子熙俊被杀的真相。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 48
programme.desc: Ep 67: A reporter is keen to expose the truth behind Enshi's disappearance 25 years ago. Mingxi panics as her extra-marital affair would be exposed. Yanghao wants Taixiu to lie that he has kidnapped Enshi 25 years ago.Ep 68: Zhenxi and her husband calls for a shareholders' meeting to dismiss Yanghao as president of the company. Mingxi finally understands why Enshi's case is suddenly made news again. Mingxi wants Zhenxi terminate her plans, but Zhenxi insists in going head to head with Yangha Ep 67: 一名记者想报道恩石失踪案的真相。明熙担心当年为了与婚外情对象见面而弄丢恩石的事被揭发，措手不及。阳浩要太修向记者谎称当年是他绑架恩石的，事成之后就报酬太修和他的家人。Ep 68: 真熙和丈夫召开股东大会，要将阳浩解任，让明水当上会长。明熙等人终于明白为何恩石的案子又突然会浮出水面。明熙要真熙收手，但真熙决定斗到底。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 8
programme.desc: For some years now, a mobile horse library helmed by a stable hand has been making its rounds around the villages of Serang. It's almost a quixotic quest to tackle Indonesia's low literacy by encouraging reading. Host Khai Saharom joins Ridwan Sururi in this endearing and noble effort to bring books to the villagers. On his journey, he meets Lasmi, a very shy young autistic girl whom Ridwan has successfully taught to read. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 8
programme.desc: Dian Xiao Er and Pu Tien are well known amongst Singaporeans but how well do they fare outside of our shores? In this episode, Bjorn travels to Shanghai to see if these two local popular restaurant chains can survive and thrive in the huge China market. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 8
programme.desc: Ep 8: The lady boss of the magical shop asks Shanmei to meet her at the shop. The bad omen water tank breaks just as Shanmei steps into the shop, causing Shanmei to see images of the world in chaos. Elder Subhuti tells Shanmei that her mission is to stop doomsday from happening. 魔法杂货店的老板要求善美到杂货店去。水缸在善美到达时破裂，溢出水来，善美因而看到世界即将毁灭的样子。须菩提说三藏的使命就是阻止灾难的发生。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 7
programme.desc: The exacerbating housing woes in Hong Kong have spawned innovative business models. There's a market now for housing guided tours, cremated ashes hotels, Murder House trading, niches to green funerals. The enterprising minds of the Hong Kong people have also sussed out business opportunities in the buying and selling of animal furs of pets and expired products. 从住屋导览、骨灰酒店、凶宅买卖、骨灰龛场到绿色殡葬等，均透视着香港房屋问题所衍生出的各种另类买卖活动，此外，宠物毛发、临期商品也让有创新思维的香港人看到商机，另辟新径，开创截然不同的买卖交易。.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 4
programme.desc: On the first meeting with Yi Kais dad, Tim, Jing Xuan joins them for prawning. Throughout the session, Jing Xuan cant help noticing how meticulous and caring Tim is, Jing Xuan feels a strong sense of fatherly love from him. After several dates, both Jing Xuan and Yi Kai are even more sure of their feelings towards each other. Yi Kai left after sending Jing Xuan home, Jing Xuan starts hearing strange sounds again, which sounds like an argument between a couple. Feeling frightened, Jing Xuan hol 静萱同亦凯和Tim来到了钓虾场钓虾。静萱和Tim第一次相处，Tim的细心与贴心让静萱体验到满满的父爱，感觉十分温馨。静萱和亦凯经过多次约会后，更确认对彼此的感情。亦凯送静萱回家后，静萱在家楼下又听见奇怪的声音，这一次好像是男女的吵架声。害怕之下，静萱紧握着脖子上的项链。时怪声变得清晰些，她认得出那是浩成的声音！静萱觉得不可思议。隔天早上，静萱起床后，惊讶发现自己的手臂上有瘀青。Ann来接Kora回家，静萱看见了Ann的高跟鞋，想起起车祸当天自己失去意识之前，看过穿着这双鞋的人出现在现场。静萱困惑，幸好有亦凯陪着她。两人一起散步，天空突然下起了雨，亦凯连忙脱下外套，为静萱遮挡，静萱感觉到亦凯的体贴，给她的安全感。静萱一时动情，吻了亦凯。两人道别后，静萱独自上楼。在电梯里，静萱伸手按电梯钮时，感觉有一滴水滴在自己的手上。静萱突然全身麻痹，双脚一软，跌坐地上…….

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 56
programme.desc: Ep 56: Xiuqing pours her sorrows to Zaiyong. Zaiyong takes the chance to wreck discord between Xiantai and Xiuqing. He also tries to kiss Xiuqing when she is drunk. Xiantai stops Zaiyong in his act and beats Zaiyong up. The clueless Xiuqing blames Xiantai for being unreasonable. Ep 56: 秀卿找载永倾诉。载永趁机暗示在贤泰的心里，英彩和真淑比秀卿重要。载永想趁秀卿醉倒时吻她。贤泰及时阻止载永，还打了他一拳。秀卿不知事发经过，怪贤泰无理取闹。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 13
programme.desc: Fengxi and Chief Fang are worried when they overhear Enhe and Zhixu quarrel over the case of Enhe's client Pu Shengen who is suspected of murdering her husband. Fengxi decides to find out the truth for them. Xianxiu asks to meet Zhixu and questions why Zhixu is suspecting him. Zhixu gives the excuse that this could be the habit he has developed when he worked as a prosecutor. 奉熙和方股长听见恩赫和智旭为恩赫的委托人朴圣恩涉嫌杀害她丈夫的官司意见不合而起争执，很是担心。奉熙决定帮助他们找出真相。贤秀约智旭见面，开门见山地质问智旭为什么一直怀疑他，智旭只好装糊涂，说这可能是他当检察官时养成的习惯。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 49
programme.desc: Ep 69: Yanghao is dismissed. Mingxi and Zaicheng may not be able to hold on to their positions too. Taixiu goes to another hospital for a check-up and finds out that he does have stomach cancer after all.Ep 70: Daojing receives a message from Taixiu just as Mingshui is about to be appointed as the new President. Daojing exposes Zhenxi for paying off dummy shareholders to amass the company's shares. Daojing is made the new President of the corporation. Ep 69: 阳浩被解任，明熙和载成同时也有被解任的危险。太修一直觉得不舒服，于是到另一间医院做检查，确定之前被误诊，太修真的患上末期胃癌。Ep 70: 正当郑明水即将接任海成集团代表理事的职位时，道京接到太修的简讯，突然说他要争取海成集团代表理事候选人的资格。随后，道京上台揭发真熙以假人头买进公司股票的诡计。道京成功被选为集团的会长。.

programme.desc: Philippines is infamously known as "The Asian Base of Black Market for Guns", the proliferation of illegal guns has posed a great threat to its national security. How do the trade-offs between legal and illegal gun dealers affect the disputes between drug gangs and political parties in Philippines? 菲律宾 - 黑枪世界 拥有“西太平洋明珠”美誉的菲律宾，有着另一个不名誉的绰号“亚洲黑枪基地”。非法枪支泛滥对菲国治安构成极大威胁。合法枪械买卖商和非法枪商之间的权衡关系，如何影响菲律宾的毒品帮派和政党纠纷呢？.

However, Wukong cannot bear to do harm to Shanmei when the opportunity arises. Ep 9: 有一只日本小鬼跑进魔王送给博物馆的老纪录片的胶卷里。魔王担心小鬼会在首映会时出现吓人，于是找善美帮忙把小鬼引出来。善美带着魔王一起进去纪录片里找日本小女孩。Ep 10: 冬将军受悟空所托，答应用法力协助悟空除掉善美。但当机会摆在眼前时，悟空却舍不得对善美下手。.
